text: Molannidae is a family of Hood casemakers in the order Trichoptera. There are at least 3 genera and 40 described species in Molannidae. The type genus for Molannidae is Molanna J Curtis, 1834. ==Genera== * Indomolannodes Wiggins, 1968 * Molanna Curtis, 1834 * Molannodes McLachlan, 1866 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * * * * Category:Trichoptera families Category:Integripalpia
title: Molannidae
